properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM VOLUNTEER WHERE SHELTER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM( SELECT V.VOLUNTEER_NO, V.SHELTER_NO, V.MEMBER_NO, V.START_DATE, V.TEL_NUMBER, V.NAME, M.MEMBER_ID, S.SHELTER_NAME, V.VOL_READ FROM VOLUNTEER V JOIN MEMBER M ON (V.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN SHELTER S ON (V.SHELTER_NO = S.SHELTER_NO) WHERE V.SHELTER_NO = ? ORDER BY V.VOLUNTEER_NO ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
